posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

8/22/22 - 8/28/22
Issue - V115
Current Release: 1.12.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Take a deep dive into data science with @adrien_treuille in this podcast!

Featured Content

  • Flash QR @gerardrbentley
  • Shakespeare Search Engine @wjbmattingly
  • Findself

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Serverless Streamlit + OpenCV Python Web App Tutorial @1littlecoder
  • Streamlit Elements You Should Know About in 2022 @misraturp
  • Build A Digital Resume Using Python & Streamlit
  • Interactive plots in dashboard with streamlit and plotly | by Nadir Nadeem
  • Animating plotly plots with one additions line of code in streamlit Program
  • Save Model Predictions on Airtable | HF Transformers Model Deployed with Streamlit | NLP | Python
  • CREA UNA PAGINA WEB DE VENTAS USANDO PYTHON Y STREAMLIT - TUTORIAL PASO A PASO
  • Streamlit intro
  • Streamlit Bar Graph
  • Streamlit text input
  • Docker for Data Scientists | streamlit | fastApi | end to end
  • Jason Koo - Intro to Streamlit
  • Tutorial: DESPLIEGUE EN LA NUBE con Streamlit Cloud
  • 20220826 Webinar: Zero to WebApp: Customized Web Interfaces for ML Applications with Streamlit
  • Sentiment Analysis Dashboard about US Airlines using Python and Streamlit
  • How to Build an Effective Web App in 8 Simple Steps Right Now
  • Create and Deploy a Face Swap App Using Python and Streamlit
  • Deploying a Text Classification Model in Python
  • How To Deploy Streamlit Webapp To Heroku - Complete Guide
  • Deploy a Language AI App Easily with Cohere and Streamlit
  • How to Develop and Deploy a Customer Churn Prediction Model Using Python, Streamlit, and Docker
  • 画像生成AI(MidjourneyとStableDiffusion)の生成結果をキーワードから一覧化するページ(Twitter検索)
  • Streamlit入門 – 一通りの機能をまとめてご紹介
  • Streamlit まとめ

Science and Tech

  • Alzheimer’s Disease Detection Using MRI Images
    Streamlit-EDSA-Lung Disease Detection App

NLP and Language

  • Reber Grammar Generation and Authenticity Validator App
  • China State Media Database
  • Text File Analyzer
  • Whatsapp Chat Analyzer
  • Email/SMS Spam Classifier
  • Whatsapp Chat Analyzer

Data Visualization

  • Quick Plotly Visualization Tour @ritesh.sharma29
  • GapMinder App
  • PodcastAddict data
  • SQL Viz app for Oracle
  • LinkedIn Engagements Dashboard (built with Streamlit)

CV and Images

  • Realtime Face Detection

Sports

  • Seltzer Sheets
  • Olympics analysis
  • Prediksi Website Phishing Menggunakan Machine Learning
  • NFL Kicker Tracking Scatter Plots
  • IPL Dashboard Using Streamlit, Pandas, Matplotlib | Sohipm | Data Science Services | Rakesh Sahni

Finance and Business

  • Bayswater Capital Wealth Management
  • Finance with Arjun app @arjunprakash027
  • Churn Prediction
  • Penipuan Online di Indonesia dan Pencegahannya
  • Political Ad Spend Explorer
  • Stocks display
  • Stock Price Analysis - for SIP purposes
  • Data scientist house rocket
  • Prediction of customer revenue
  • Trading Game
  • Telecom User Engagement and Satisfaction Analysis Streamlit Dashboard

General

  • Convert grade marks to grade letters @hooti
  • Find good first issues
  • E-Commerce Recommender System
  • Movie Recommender System
  • Currículo Digital Python Streamlit Wep App

Model building and training

Cool happenings and other things

  • Streamlit_login_auth ui
  • Webinar: Zero to Web App: Rapid Customized Web Interfaces for Your ML Applications with Streamlit
  • Open Data Beer Upcoming event 9/8
  • SNOWFLAKE STREAMLIT MASTERCLASS Upcoming class 9/15

Follow us
